Name: Age Group
Description: The length of time that a person/individual has lived.

Name: Attrition Status
Description: Indicates customer's attrition status. For example: attrited, not attrited

Name: Cleanliness Rating
Description: Customer's rating for the cleanliness of a store or an establishment.

Name: Customer Annual Income
Description: The amount of money an individual earns in a single year. Usually includes person's salary and bonuses as well as any other non-employment related income such as dividends from holdings in stocks and shares, trusts.

Name: Customer Expense
Description: The total range of expenditure made by a customer at a given store or establishment.

Name: Customer Identifier
Description: A unique number that identifies the customer.

Name: Customer Visit Type
Description: Classification of a customer's visit type. For eg : Takeaway, Dine-in etc

Name: Discount
Description: A deduction made by the seller from the normal sales price of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product
Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Sales

Name: Distance to Nearest Store
Description: Distance between the nearest store or establishment and a customer's residence.

Name: Gender
Description: Indicates an individual's gender, for example: male, female.

Name: Gross Profit
Description: The profit made by selling the product after deducting the cost.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Membership Indicator
Description: Indicates whether is a customer is a member at a given store or establishment.

Name: Merchant
Description: A merchant is an organization involved in the retail trade whose purpose is to buy and sell goods for profit. Also known as a retailer.

Name: Merchant Name
Description: Identifies the name of the merchant.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Merchant

Name: Merchant Type
Description: Identifies the type of a merchant or retailer.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Merchant

Name: Observation date time
Description: The date and time of the weather observation.

Name: Occupation
Description: Name of the person's work or business engagement, for example: farmer, professional, tradesperson, author, business owner, consultant, doctor, economist, homemaker.

Name: Order Method Type
Description: Method used by the customer to order a product, for example: phone, web, e-mail.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Price Rating
Description: Customer's rating for the prices at a given store or establishment.

Name: Product
Description: Product identifies goods and services that can be offered, sold, or purchased by the customers.

Name: Product cost
Description: The total cost involved in creating the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Product Description
Description: Provides a textual explanation or free form comments about the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Product Identifier
Description: A unique number that identifies a product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Product Line
Description: A group or category of related products.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Product Line Code
Description: A code that indicates the product line.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Product Name
Description: The primary name assigned to the product that is used in reports and documents referring to the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product
Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Sales

Name: Product Offer
Description: Details of the offer of the product to a particular customer based on the industry.

Name: Product Offer Date
Description: The date on which the product was offered to customer.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product Offer

Name: Product Owned Indicator
Description: Indicator of whether a particular product that was offered to a customer is now owned by the customer or not.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product Offer

Name: Product Quantity
Description: Indicates the quantity of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Products Purchased
Description: List of products purchased by a customer. For eg : Coffee, Pastries.

Name: Product Type
Description: The merchandising category of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product
Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Sales

Name: Product Type Code
Description: A code to indicate the merchandising category of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Product Warranty Indicator
Description: Indicates whether the product is under warranty from an organization.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Promotion Rating
Description: Customer's rating to promote a given store or establishment.

Name: Revenue
Description: Income generated from selling a product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Sales
Description: The details about sales.

Name: Sales Amount
Description: The monetary value of sales recorded on a given day.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Sales

Name: Sales Status
Description: The status of a sale, for example; closed, cancelled
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Sales

Name: Sales Store
Description: The retail store in which the sale took place.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Store
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Sales

Name: Store
Description: The retail store.

Name: Store Ambience Rating
Description: Customer's rating for the ambience of a given store or establishment.

Name: Store Identifier
Description: A numeric identifier of a retail store.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Store

Name: Store location
Description: Identifies geographic location of store.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Store

Name: Store name
Description: The name of a retail store.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Store

Name: Store Product Options Rating
Description: Customer's rating based on the amount of options of products available at a given store or establishment.

Name: Store Quality Rating
Description: Customer's rating of the quality of a store or establishment.

Name: Store Radius
Description: Distance

Name: Store Service Rating
Description: Customer's rating for a service of a given store or establishment.

Name: Time Spent
Description: Time spent at a given place, store or establishment by a customer

Name: Unit Cost
Description: Indicates the unit cost of a product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Unit Price
Description: The sale price of one unit of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Retail Customer Retention >> Product

Name: Visit Frequency
Description: The frequency of visits made by a customer to an establishment. For eg : Rarely, Weekly etc
